original: rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang snang ba ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang snang ba ma yin /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the Great Vehicle is neither expressible nor inexpressible.🔽 Therefore, it is said, that vehicle is equal to space.

original: mun pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mun pa ma yin te /
translated: Subhūti, it is just as space is neither defiled nor purified.🔽 Subhūti, in the same way, the Great Vehicle is neither defiled nor purified.

original: de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, that vehicle is equal to space.🔽 Subhūti, it is just as space is neither arising nor ceasing.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni dmigs su yod pa yang ma yin /🔽dmigs su med pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni dmigs su yod pa yang ma yin / dmigs su med pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the Great Vehicle is neither arising nor ceasing.🔽 Therefore, it is said, that vehicle is equal to space.🔽 Subhūti, it is just as space is neither past, future, or present.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang dmigs su yod pa yang ma yin /🔽dmigs su med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang dmigs su yod pa yang ma yin / dmigs su med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the Great Vehicle is neither past, future, or present.

original: de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, that vehicle is equal to space.🔽 Subhūti, it is just as space is neither defiled nor undefiled.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni brjod du yod pa yang ma yin /🔽brjod du med pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni brjod du yod pa yang ma yin / brjod du med pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the Great Vehicle is neither defiled nor undefiled.🔽 Therefore, it is said, that vehicle is equal to space.🔽 Subhūti, it is just as space is neither with attachment nor without attachment.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang brjod du yod pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang brjod du yod pa yang ma yin /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the Great Vehicle is neither with attachment nor without attachment.🔽 Therefore, it is said, that vehicle is equal to space.🔽 Subhūti, it is just as

original: brjod du med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod du med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not inexpressible.

original: de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dad mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dad mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this vehicle is said to be equal to space.

original: rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, for this reason, this Great Vehicle is equal to space.🔽Thus, the Great Vehicle is said to be equal to space.

original: 'di ltar theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: This is the determination of equality.

original: rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du ji ltar nam mkha' la sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go🔽skabs yod pa yin no zhes smras pa de ni de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du ji ltar nam mkha' la sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa yin no zhes smras pa de ni de bzhin te /
translated: Subhūti, you said, “Just as there is room in space for countless, immeasurable, and limitless sentient beings, in the same way, there is room in this Great Vehicle for countless, immeasurable, and limitless sentient beings.”🔽That is so, just as you have said.

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: It is just so, just as you have said.

original: ji ltar na nam mkha' la sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go skabs yod do //
analyzed: ji ltar na nam mkha' la sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go skabs yod do //
translated: Just as space provides room for countless, immeasurable sentient beings, so too this Great Vehicle provides room for countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor sems can med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o//
analyzed: rab 'byor sems can med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o//
translated: Subhūti, space should be known to be nonexistent because sentient beings are nonexistent.

original: @268a * // nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: @268a * // nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, the Great Vehicle should be known to be nonexistent because space is nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations, that Great Vehicle provides room for countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because those sentient beings, that space, and that Great Vehicle—all of them—are not apprehended.

original: gzhan yang rab 'byor sems can med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang rab 'byor sems can med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, space should be known to be nonexistent because sentient beings are nonexistent.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //🔽theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o // theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med par rig par bya ste /
translated: The Great Vehicle should be known to be immeasurable because space is nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, for this reason, in that Great Vehicle there is room for innumerable, countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / gzhal du med pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / gzhal du med pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because those sentient beings, that space, that Great Vehicle, and that immeasurability—all these are non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, space should be known to be nonexistent because sentient beings are nonexistent.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle should be known to be immeasurable because space is nonexistent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir grangs med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir grangs med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the Great Vehicle, one should know that the incalculable is nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa'i go skabs yod par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa'i go skabs yod par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, it should be known that in this way the Great Vehicle has room for innumerable, incalculable, unlimited sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / grangs med pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / grangs med pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because those sentient beings, that space, that Great Vehicle, and that incalculable are all nonapprehensible.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can tshad med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can tshad med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //

original: nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle should be known to be nonexistent because space is nonexistent.

analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir tshad med pa med par rig par bya ste /
translated: The incalculable should be known to be nonexistent because the Great Vehicle is nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
translated: Subhūti, it should be known that in this way the Great Vehicle has room for innumerable, incalculable, unlimited sentient beings.

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the countless, and the immeasurable.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po @268b gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po @268b gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because sentient beings, space, the Great Vehicle, and the immeasurables are all non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can tshad med pa'i phyir nam mkha' tshad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can tshad med pa'i phyir nam mkha' tshad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, space should be known as immeasurable because sentient beings are immeasurable.

original: nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po tshad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po tshad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: And the Great Vehicle should be known as immeasurable because space is immeasurable.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang rnam grangs 'dis kyang theg pa chen po des sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang rnam grangs 'dis kyang theg pa chen po des sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, by this one of many explanations, this Great Vehicle accommodates countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
translated: Subhūti, it is because sentient beings, space, and the Great Vehicle are all non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, furthermore, the Tathāgata should be known as non-existent because sentient beings are non-existent.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Space should be known as non-existent because the Tathāgata is non-existent.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle should be known as non-existent because space is non-existent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas med par rig par bya'o //🔽'dus ma byas med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa med par rig par bya'o //🔽gzhal du med pa med pa'i phyir grangs med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas med par rig par bya'o // 'dus ma byas med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa med par rig par bya'o // gzhal du med pa med pa'i phyir grangs med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The unconditioned should be known as non-existent because the Great Vehicle is non-existent.🔽The immeasurable should be known as non-existent because the unconditioned is non-existent.🔽The innumerable should be known as non-existent because the immeasurable is non-existent.

original: grangs med pa med pa'i phyir tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: grangs med pa med pa'i phyir tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The inconceivable should be known as non-existent because the innumerable is non-existent.

original: tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Since the immeasurables do not exist, all phenomena should be known as nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po 'di la sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa'i go skabs yod do //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po 'di la sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa'i go skabs yod do //
translated: Subhūti, it is in this way that there is room in this Great Vehicle for innumerable, countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas gang yin pa dang / gzhal du med pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas gang yin pa dang / gzhal du med pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: And why?

original: grangs med pa gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grangs med pa gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because sentient beings, tathāgatas, space, the Great Vehicle, the unconditioned, the immeasurable, the countless, the immeasurable, and all phenomena—none of them can be apprehended.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because there is no self, there are no sentient beings, no living beings, no creatures, no humans, no persons, no descendants of Manu, no descendants of Manu, no agents, no experiencers, no knowers,

original: mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and no seers.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' med par rig par bya'o //🔽yang dag pa'i @269a * //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' med par rig par bya'o // yang dag pa'i @269a * //
translated: You should know that because there are no seers, there is no limit of reality.

original: mtha' med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because there is no limit of reality, there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because there is no space, there is no Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because there is no Great Vehicle, there is no immeasurability, no uncountability, and no boundlessness.

original: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because there is no immeasurability, no uncountability, and no boundlessness, there are no phenomena.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, there is room in this Great Vehicle for innumerable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa yin no //
translated: immeasurable, incalculable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, up to

original: mthong ba po'i bar gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba po'i bar gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the one who sees, the limit of reality, the uncountable, the immeasurable, the incalculable, and all dharmas are all non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, you should know that sentient beings do not exist because of the non-existence of a self.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the one who knows does not exist because of the non-existence of sentient beings.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the one who sees does not exist because of the non-existence of the one who knows.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the inconceivable element does not exist because of the non-existence of the one who sees.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir gzugs med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir gzugs med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because the inconceivable element is non-existent, one should know that form is non-existent.

original: gzugs med pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because form is non-existent, one should know that feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are non-existent.

original: rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because consciousness is non-existent, one should know that space is non-existent.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because space is non-existent, one should know that the Great Vehicle is non-existent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because the Great Vehicle is non-existent, one should know that the incalculable, the immeasurable, and the infinite are non-existent.

original: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o // rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
translated: because the incalculable, the immeasurable, and the infinite are non-existent, one should know that all dharmas are non-existent.

original: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin te /
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin te /
translated: “Subhūti, thus in that Great Vehicle there is room for incalculable, immeasurable, infinite beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
translated: Subhuti: Because the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix of the Tathagatas, and the one who has been begotten by the perfection of wisdom is the Tathagata.🔽

original: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, up to all dharmas are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang @269b bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang @269b bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self, there are no sentient beings.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of sentient beings, you should know that there are no knowers, up to no experiencers.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of knowers, you should know that there are no experiencers.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o//
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o//
translated: Because of the nonexistence of experiencers, you should know that there is no inconceivable element.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir mig med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir mig med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the inconceivable element, you should know that there is no eye.

original: mig med pa'i phyir rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mig med pa'i phyir rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the eye, you should know that there is no ear, nose, tongue, body, or thinking mind.

original: yid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the thinking mind, you should know that there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of space, you should know that there is no Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the Great Vehicle, one should know that there is no immeasurability, no uncountability, and no incomparability.

original: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of immeasurability, uncountability, and incomparability, one should know that all dharmas do not exist.

original: rab 'byor de ltar theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
translated: Subhūti, in that way, in the Great Vehicle, there is room for immeasurable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin no //
translated: uncountable, and incomparable beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
translated: And why?🔽Subhūti, it is because all those—from the self to all dharmas—

original: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro /🔽// / bam po nyi shu gcig pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro / // / bam po nyi shu gcig pa /
translated: are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, because of the nonexistence of a self, one should know that a being does not exist.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a being, one should know that up to one who knows and one who sees does not exist.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no seer, one should know that there is no perfection of giving.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Because there is no perfection of giving, one should know that there is no perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no perfection of wisdom, one should know that there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //🔽theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad @270a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o // theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad @270a * //
translated: Because there is no space, one should know that there is no Great Vehicle.

original: med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Great Vehicle, one should know that there is no immeasurability, no uncountability, and no incomparability.

original: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor de ltar theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o // rab 'byor de ltar theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
translated: and because there is no immeasurable, no innumerable, and no infinite, all dharmas should be known as nonexistent.

original: grangs med tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs med tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, it is because there is room in that Great Vehicle for immeasurable, innumerable, infinite beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
translated: And why?

original: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because all those—from a self to all dharmas—are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that beings do not exist because a self does not exist.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that up to the one who knows and the one who sees do not exist because beings do not exist.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the one who sees does not exist because the one who knows does not exist.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that inner emptiness does not exist because the one who sees does not exist.

original: nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of inner emptiness, one should know the non-existence of outer emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of outer emptiness, one should know the non-existence of inner and outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of inner and outer emptiness, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of emptiness, up to the non-existence of the emptiness of own-marks.🔽Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of own-marks, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of all things.🔽Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of all things, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of non-existence.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //🔽nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o // nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of non-existence, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of ultimate reality, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of the conditioned, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of the unconditioned, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of the unlimited.🔽Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of the unlimited, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of that which is fundamentally so.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of that which is fundamentally so, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of that which is not so.🔽Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of that which is not so, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of all things.

original: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of all things, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of own-being.🔽Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of own-being, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of other-being.🔽Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of other-being, one should know the non-existence of the emptiness of own-being and other-being.🔽Because of the non-existence of the emptiness of own-being and other-being, one should know the non-existence of space.🔽Because of the non-existence of space, one should know the non-existence of the Great Vehicle.🔽Because of the non-existence of the Great Vehicle, one should

original: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
translated: Subhuti: So it is, O Lord, so it is, O Well-Gone.🔽

original: grangs med pa tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin te /
analyzed: grangs med pa tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin te /
translated: Subhūti, it is because of this that the Great Vehicle has room for innumerable, countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
translated: And why is that?

original: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because all those things, from the self up to all dharmas, are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that sentient beings do not exist because of the nonexistence of a self.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the one who knows does not exist because of the nonexistence of sentient beings.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the one who sees does not exist because of the nonexistence of the one who knows.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the applications of mindfulness do not exist because of the nonexistence of the one who sees.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir yang dag @270b par spong ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir yang dag @270b par spong ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the right efforts do not exist because of the nonexistence of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the bases of spiritual power are nonexistent because the correct exertions are nonexistent.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'i phyir dbang po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'i phyir dbang po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the faculties are nonexistent because the bases of spiritual power are nonexistent.

original: dbang po med pa'i phyir stobs med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po med pa'i phyir stobs med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the powers are nonexistent because the faculties are nonexistent.

original: stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the limbs of awakening are nonexistent because the powers are nonexistent.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'i phyir lam med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'i phyir lam med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the path is nonexistent because the limbs of awakening are nonexistent.

original: lam med pa'i phyir bsam gtan med par rig par bya'o //🔽bsam gtan med pa'i phyir tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //🔽tshad med pa med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lam med pa'i phyir bsam gtan med par rig par bya'o // bsam gtan med pa'i phyir tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o // tshad med pa med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the meditative stabilities are nonexistent because the path is nonexistent.🔽You should know that the immeasurables are nonexistent because the meditative stabilities are nonexistent.🔽You should know that the formless absorptions are nonexistent because the immeasurables are nonexistent.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the correct understandings are nonexistent because the formless absorptions are nonexistent.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa med pas stobs rnams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa med pas stobs rnams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because of the absence of the analytical knowledges, the powers should be understood to be absent.

original: stobs rnams med pas mi 'jigs pa rnams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams med pas mi 'jigs pa rnams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because of the absence of the powers, the fearlessnesses should be understood to be absent.

original: mi 'jigs pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because of the absence of the fearlessnesses, the distinct attributes of a buddha should be understood to be absent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pas nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pas nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because of the absence of the distinct attributes of a buddha, space should be understood to be absent.

original: nam mkha' med pas theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pas theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because of the absence of space, the Great Vehicle should be understood to be absent.

original: theg pa chen po med pas gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pas gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because of the absence of the Great Vehicle, the incalculable, the immeasurable, and the infinite should be understood to be absent.

original: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o // rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
translated: and because of the absence of the incalculable, the immeasurable, and the infinite, all phenomena should be understood to be absent.

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa yin te /
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod pa yin te /
translated: “Subhūti, thus in that Great Vehicle there is room for innumerable, incalculable, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
translated: If you ask why,

original: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //🔽rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because all these things, from the self to the omniscience of the tathāgatas, are non-apprehensible.

original: sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, you should know that because there is no self, there is no sentient being.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no sentient being, you should know that there is no one who knows.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who knows, you should know that there is no one who sees.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rigs kyi sa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rigs kyi sa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who sees, you should know that there is no level of the spiritual family.

original: rigs kyi sa med pa'i phyir brgyad pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o //🔽brgyad pa'i sa med pa'i phyir mthong ba'i @271a * //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa med pa'i phyir brgyad pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o // brgyad pa'i sa med pa'i phyir mthong ba'i @271a * //
translated: Because there is no level of the spiritual family, you should know that there is no level of the eighth.

original: sa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no level of the eighth, you should know that there is no level of insight.

original: mthong ba'i sa med pa'i phyir bsrabs pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba'i sa med pa'i phyir bsrabs pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no level of insight, you should know that there is no level of thinning.

original: bsrabs pa'i sa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsrabs pa'i sa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no stage of thinning out, there is no stage of freedom from attachment.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med pa'i phyir byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med pa'i phyir byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no stage of freedom from attachment, there is no stage of realization of what has been done.

original: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no stage of realization of what has been done, there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no space, there is no Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Great Vehicle, there is no incalculable, no immeasurable, and no infinite.

original: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no incalculable, no immeasurable, and no infinite, there is no existence of all dharmas.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na /🔽theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na / theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
translated: Subhūti, thus

original: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin te /
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin te /
translated: in that Great Vehicle there is room for incalculable, immeasurable, infinite beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
translated: Subhuti: Because the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix of the Tathagatas, and the one who has been begotten by the perfection of wisdom is the Tathagata.🔽

original: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, up to all dharmas are all non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self, there is no sentient being.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a sentient being, there is no one who knows, up to no one who sees.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who knows, there is no one who sees.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who sees, there is no stream enterer.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa med pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa med pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a stream enterer, there is no once-returner.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba med pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba med pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a once-returner, there is no non-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba med pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba med pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a non-returner, there is no arhat.

original: dgra bcom pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of an arhat, there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because of the non-existence of space, the Great Vehicle should be known as non-existent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because of the non-existence of the Great Vehicle, the incalculable, the immeasurable, and the infinite should be known as non-existent.

original: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o // rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
translated: because of the non-existence of the incalculable, the immeasurable, and the infinite, all dharmas should be known as non-existent.

original: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin te /
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin te /
translated: Subhūti, it is because of this that there is room in the Great Vehicle for innumerable, incalculable, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa @271b nas /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa @271b nas /
translated: And why?

original: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because a self, up to all dharmas are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, because of the non-existence of a self, a sentient being should be known as non-existent.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of a sentient being, up to one who knows and one who sees should be known as non-existent.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who knows, one should know that there is no one who sees.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who sees, one should know that there is no Śrāvaka Vehicle.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o /
translated: Because there is no Śrāvaka Vehicle, one should know that there is no Pratyekabuddha Vehicle.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Pratyekabuddha Vehicle, one should know that there is no Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Tathāgata, one should know that there is no knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knowledge of all aspects, one should know that there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no space, one should know that there is no Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Great Vehicle, one should know that there is no immeasurableness, no uncountableness, and no boundlessness.

original: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because there is no unappraisable, no innumerable, and no measureless, all dharmas should be known as nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la sems can gzhal du med /
translated: Subhūti, it is because of this that there is room in this Great Vehicle for innumerable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin te /
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin te /
translated: immeasurable, and incalculable beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa nas /
translated: And why is it so?

original: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin sa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin sa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because all those things, from the self up to the knowledge of all modes, are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la ni sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la ni sems can gzhal du med /
translated: Subhūti, it is just as there is room in the element of nirvāṇa for innumerable,

original: grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod do //
analyzed: grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod do //
translated: immeasurable, incalculable beings.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang sems can gzhal du med /
translated: Subhūti, it is just so that there is room in this Great Vehicle for innumerable,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod do //
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa rnams kyi go skabs yod do //
translated: immeasurable, incalculable beings.

original: rab 'byor nam mkha' ni sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: rab 'byor nam mkha' ni sems can gzhal du med /
translated: Subhūti, space has room for innumerable,🔽immeasurable, incalculable beings.

original: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin no//
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin no//
translated: There is an opportunity for countless,🔽immeasurable, incalculable sentient beings.

original: de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang sems can gzhal du med /
analyzed: de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang sems can gzhal du med /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, in this Great Vehicle, too, there is an opportunity for countless,

original: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don du nges par 'byung ba yin no //🔽rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de la 'ong ba'am /
analyzed: grangs med / tshad med pa'i go skabs yod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don du nges par 'byung ba yin no // rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de la 'ong ba'am /
translated: immeasurable, incalculable sentient beings.”

original: 'gro ba yang mi mthong @272a * //
analyzed: 'gro ba yang mi mthong @272a * //
translated: “Subhūti, you said, ‘I do not see that Great Vehicle coming or going,

original: gnas pa yang mi mthong ngo zhes smras pa ni rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: gnas pa yang mi mthong ngo zhes smras pa ni rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: or remaining either.’

original: de de bzhin te /🔽theg pa chen po de la 'ong ba 'am /
analyzed: de de bzhin te / theg pa chen po de la 'ong ba 'am /
translated: Subhūti, it is just so, it is just like that.

original: 'gro ba yang mi mthong /
analyzed: 'gro ba yang mi mthong /
translated: In that Great Vehicle, too, I do not see it coming or going,

original: gnas pa yang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gnas pa yang mi mthong ngo //
translated: or remaining either.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni g-yo ba med pa ste /🔽de dag gang nas kyang 'ong ba med do //🔽gang du yang 'dong ba med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni g-yo ba med pa ste / de dag gang nas kyang 'ong ba med do // gang du yang 'dong ba med do //
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena are motionless.🔽They do not come from anywhere,🔽they do not go anywhere,

original: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: and they do not remain anywhere.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor de ni de ltar gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med gang du yang 'gro ba med /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni de ltar gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med gang du yang 'gro ba med /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of physical forms has neither come from anywhere, nor has it gone anywhere,

original: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: nor is it present anywhere.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
translated: The intrinsic nature of feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness has neither come from anywhere,

original: gang du yang 'gro ba med /
analyzed: gang du yang 'gro ba med /
translated: nor has it gone anywhere,

original: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: nor is it present anywhere.

original: rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
translated: Su­bhūti, the real nature of physical forms has neither come from anywhere,

original: gang du yang 'gro ba med /
analyzed: gang du yang 'gro ba med /
translated: nor has it gone anywhere,

original: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: nor is it present anywhere.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
translated: The real nature of feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness has neither come from anywhere,

original: gang du yang 'gro ba med /
analyzed: gang du yang 'gro ba med /
translated: nor has it gone anywhere,

original: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: nor is it present anywhere.

original: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
analyzed: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
translated: The essential nature of physical forms has neither come from anywhere,

original: gang du yang 'gro ba med /
analyzed: gang du yang 'gro ba med /
translated: it does not go anywhere,

original: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: and it does not stand anywhere.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
translated: The intrinsic nature of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness does not come from anywhere,

original: gang du yang 'gro ba med /
analyzed: gang du yang 'gro ba med /
translated: it does not go anywhere,

original: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: “It is just as you have said.

original: theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the future limit is not apprehended,

original: dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: and the middle is not apprehended.

original: theg pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir theg pa chen po zhes brjod do //
analyzed: theg pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir theg pa chen po zhes brjod do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong ngo //

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong ngo //

analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong ngo //

analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong ngo //

original: theg pa chen po yang theg pa chen pos stong ngo //
analyzed: theg pa chen po yang theg pa chen pos stong ngo //

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ste /

original: rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gcig ces bya ba med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gcig ces bya ba med do //
translated: Subhūti, in emptiness there is no one,🔽no two,

original: gnyis sam / gsum mam /
analyzed: gnyis sam / gsum mam /
translated: no three,🔽no four,

original: bzhi'am / lnga'am /
analyzed: bzhi'am / lnga'am /
translated: no five,🔽no six,

original: drug gam / bdun nam /
analyzed: drug gam / bdun nam /
translated: no seven,🔽no eight,

original: brgyad dam / dgu'am /
analyzed: brgyad dam / dgu'am /
translated: no nine,

original: bcu zhes bya ba med do //
analyzed: bcu zhes bya ba med do //
translated: and no ten.

original: de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste /
translated: Therefore, this is the vehicle of sameness of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: de la mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: In it, sameness and difference are not apprehended.

original: de la 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba yang mi dmigs so //🔽zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med pa yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba yang mi dmigs so // zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med pa yang mi dmigs so //
translated: In it, desire and freedom from desire are not apprehended.🔽Anger and freedom from anger are not apprehended.

original: gti mug dang gti mug med pa yang ma dmigs so //
analyzed: gti mug dang gti mug med pa yang ma dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance and freedom from ignorance are not apprehended.

original: ming dang ming med pa yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ming dang ming med pa yang mi dmigs so //
translated: Name and namelessness are not apprehended.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyang mi dmigs so //
translated: The compounded and the uncompounded are not apprehended.

original: dge ba dang / mi dge ba yang mi @275a * //
analyzed: dge ba dang / mi dge ba yang mi @275a * //
translated: The virtuous and the nonvirtuous are not apprehended.

original: dmigs so // kha na ma tho ba yod pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dmigs so // kha na ma tho ba yod pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend the blameworthy or the blameless.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is with outflows or what is without outflows.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is afflicted or what is unafflicted.

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is mundane or what is supramundane.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is afflicted or what is purified.

original: 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend saṃsāra or nirvāṇa.

original: de la rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is permanent or what is impermanent.

original: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is blissful or what is suffering.

original: bdag dang / bdag med pa yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bdag dang / bdag med pa yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is a self or what is a non-self.

original: zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is peaceful or what is not peaceful.

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend the desire realm or transcending the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: the form element and the transcendence of the form element are non-apprehensible,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: the formless element and the transcendence of the formless element are non-apprehensible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: it is because their intrinsic nature is non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, past form is empty of past form.

original: rab 'byor 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, past feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of past consciousness.

original: rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, future form is empty of future form.

original: rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, future feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of future consciousness.

original: rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, present form is empty of present form.

original: rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, present feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of present consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
translated: Empty of emptiness, past form is not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
translated: Since emptiness is empty of emptiness, it is not apprehended.

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /

analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos /

analyzed: stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
translated: Future form is not apprehended in emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na /

analyzed: re zhig stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /

original: stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos /
