analyzed: rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs te /
translated: “Subhūti, the perfection of giving is not apprehended because of the sameness of the three times.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
translated: The perfection of giving is not apprehended in the past,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: The perfection of generosity is not found in the future.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of generosity is not found in the present.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, the past time is not found in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: the future time is not found in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /🔽mnyam @276a * //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te / mnyam @276a * //
translated: and the present time is not found in sameness.

original: pa nyid kyang re zhig mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na /🔽mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: pa nyid kyang re zhig mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na / mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: Sameness is not found in sameness,🔽so how could the past time be found in sameness?🔽How could the future time be found in sameness?

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: How could the present time be found in sameness?

original: rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are not apprehended in the past,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is not apprehended in the future,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs te /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is not apprehended in the present,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom is not apprehended because the three times are the same.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs /🔽mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, the past time is not apprehended in sameness,🔽the future time is not apprehended in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
translated: the present time is not apprehended in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid kyang re zhig mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyang re zhig mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na /
translated: and since sameness is not apprehended in sameness,🔽how could the perfection of wisdom be apprehended in the three times?

original: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: What need is there to mention the observation of the past time in the sameness?

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: What need is there to mention the observation of the future time and the present time in the sameness?

original: rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, the applications of mindfulness are not observed in the prior limit,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: the applications of mindfulness are not observed in the later limit,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs te /
translated: the applications of mindfulness are not observed in the present.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not observed because of the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, the past time is not observed in the sameness, the future time is not observed in the sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
translated: the present time is not observed in the sameness.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na /
translated: If even the sameness is not observed in the sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: what need is there to mention the observation of the past time in the sameness?

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: how could the past, future, and present be apprehended?

original: rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and eightfold noble path are not apprehended in the past,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan @276b lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan @276b lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: the eightfold noble path is not apprehended in the future,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs te /
translated: the eightfold noble path is not apprehended in the present,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
translated: and the eightfold noble path is not apprehended in the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs /🔽mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: And why?🔽Subhūti, the past time is not apprehended in sameness,🔽the future time is not apprehended in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
translated: and the present time is not apprehended in sameness.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na /
translated: If even sameness is not apprehended in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: how could the past time be apprehended in sameness?🔽How could the future time be apprehended in sameness?

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: How could the present time be apprehended in sameness?

original: rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four kinds of fearlessness, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended in the past limit,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended in the future limit,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs te /
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended in the present.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended because of the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, the past time is not apprehended in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: In sameness, the future time is not apprehended.

original: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te /
translated: In sameness, the present time is not apprehended.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na /🔽mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na / mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: If even sameness is not apprehended in sameness,🔽how could the past time be apprehended in sameness?🔽How could the future time be apprehended in sameness?

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: How could the present time be apprehended in sameness?

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /🔽so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs / so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, an ordinary being is not apprehended at the prior limit,🔽an ordinary being is not apprehended at the later limit,

original: so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: an ordinary being is not apprehended in the present,

original: so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
translated: and an ordinary being is not apprehended through the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because sentient beings are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, a śrāvaka is not apprehended at the prior limit,

original: nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: a śrāvaka is not apprehended at the later limit,

original: nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
analyzed: nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: the śrāvaka is not apprehended in the present,

original: nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
analyzed: nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
translated: and the śrāvaka is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sems can @277a * //
analyzed: sems can @277a * //
translated: Because sentient beings

original: dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /🔽rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs / rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, the pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the past,🔽the pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the future,

original: rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: the pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the present,

original: rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
translated: and the pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because sentient beings are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the present,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs te /
translated: and the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?🔽

original: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro /🔽// / bam po nyi shu gnyis pa /
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro / // / bam po nyi shu gnyis pa /
translated: If you ask why, it is because sentient beings are non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs / de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, the tathāgatas are not apprehended in the limit of past time,🔽the tathāgatas are not apprehended in the limit of future time,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: the tathāgatas are not apprehended in the present,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: and the tathāgatas are not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you ask why, it is because sentient beings are non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
translated: “Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings, abiding in the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: should train in the sameness of the three times and should perfect omniscience.

original: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa chen po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa chen po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This, Subhūti, is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva, called the Great Vehicle of the sameness of the three times.

original: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te /
analyzed: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te /
translated: Abiding in it, the bodhisattva-mahāsattva surpasses the world with its gods, humans, and asuras,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni mtha' las 'das par nges par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni mtha' las 'das par nges par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: and goes forth to the knowledge of all aspects. This is the going forth beyond extremes.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di legs par gsungs pa ni legs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di legs par gsungs pa ni legs so //
translated: Blessed One, the Blessed One's excellent teaching of the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva, called the sameness of the three times, is excellent!

original: @277b legs so //
analyzed: @277b legs so //
translated: Excellent, Blessed One!

original: bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo //
translated: “Blessed One, past bodhisattva great beings trained in this Great Vehicle and attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Blessed One, future bodhisattva great beings will also train in this perfection of wisdom and attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gzhal du ma mchis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gzhal du ma mchis /
translated: Blessed One, in the worlds of the ten directions, which are beyond measure,

original: grangs ma mchis /
analyzed: grangs ma mchis /
translated: beyond number,

original: tshad ma mchis pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mchis pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste /
analyzed: tshad ma mchis pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mchis pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste /
translated: and beyond limit, the bodhisattva great beings who are there have trained in this Great Vehicle and attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags te /
translated: Blessed One, for that reason this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is called

original: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: the sameness of the three times.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One said to the venerable Su­bhūti,

original: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: “Su­bhūti, that is so!

original: de de bzhin te /🔽theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to //
analyzed: de de bzhin te / theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to //
translated: That is so!

original: brnyes so // brnyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brnyes so // brnyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having trained in this Great Vehicle, the bodhisattva great beings of the past, present, and future have attained, are attaining, and will attain omniscience.🔽”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Pūrṇa Maitrāyaṇī­putra said to the Blessed One,🔽“Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsko ba mdzad pas 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan par sems so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsko ba mdzad pas 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan par sems so //
translated: Subhuti: The Tathagata has appointed the Elder Subhuti to expound the perfection of wisdom.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the Venerable Subhuti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur pa lags grang /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur pa lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Lord, have I, in expounding the great vehicle, contradicted the perfection of wisdom?

original: rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa med de /
translated: The Lord: No, Subhuti, you have not.

original: rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to //
analyzed: rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to //
translated: You have expounded the great vehicle in accordance with the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos byang chub @278a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos byang chub @278a * //
translated: Because, Subhuti, all the wholesome dharmas, whatever they are,

original: kyi phyogs gang yang rung ste /
analyzed: kyi phyogs gang yang rung ste /
translated: whether of the Disciple,

original: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
translated: the śrāvaka teachings,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
translated: the pratyekabuddha teachings,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
translated: the bodhisattva teachings,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do //
translated: and the buddha teachings are all included in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags /
translated: “Blessed One, what are the wholesome dharmas, the elements leading to enlightenment, that are included in the perfection of wisdom, the śrāvaka teachings, the pratyekabuddha teachings, the bodhisattva teachings, and the buddha teachings?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: “They are as follows:

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical emanation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang /
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and the six clairvoyances;

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, the four kinds of correct knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, great joy, and great equanimity, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: mi brjed pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyis rnam par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: mi brjed pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyis rnam par spyod pa ste /
translated: the nature of not forgetting, and the constant practice of equanimity.

original: rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, these are the wholesome dharmas that are included in and contained within the perfection of wisdom,

original: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so //
translated: the dharmas of the śrāvakas, the dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas, the dharmas of the bodhisattvas, and the dharmas of the buddhas.”🔽“

original: rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa @278b dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa @278b dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, in this regard, the Great Vehicle, the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, the perfection of generosity, form, feeling,

original: 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, the eyes, forms, eye consciousness, eye contact,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
translated: the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, and the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye;🔽the ear, sounds, the ear consciousness, the contact that arises from the coming together of the ear,🔽the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear, and the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear; the nose, smells, the nose consciousness, the contact that arises from the coming together of the nose,🔽the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose, and the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose; the tongue, tastes, the tongue consciousness, the contact that arises from the coming together of the tongue,

original: lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang /
translated: the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue, and the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue; the body,

original: reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang /
translated: What is contact? What is body consciousness? What is body contact? What is the feeling that arises from body contact? What is the mind?

original: chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang /
translated: What are phenomena? What is mind consciousness? What is mind contact? What is the feeling that arises from mind contact? What are the applications of mindfulness?

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: What are the correct exertions? What are the bases of supernatural powers? What are the faculties? What are the powers? What are the branches of awakening? What is the noble eightfold path?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon @279a * //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon @279a * //
translated: the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation;

original: pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang /
translated: whatever is suffering, whatever is the origin of suffering, whatever is the cessation of suffering, whatever is the path, whatever is the desire realm, whatever is the form realm,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa dang /
translated: whatever is the formless realm, whatever is inner emptiness, whatever is outer emptiness, whatever is inner and outer emptiness, up to whatever is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /
translated: the absorptions, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, the Dharma taught by the Tathāgata, the Vinaya, the dharma-constituent,

original: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te /
translated: suchness, the very limit of reality, the inconceivable element, and the element of nirvāṇa—all those dharmas are neither conjoined nor disjoined;

original: gzugs med pa bstan du med pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa bstan du med pa /
translated: It is formless, cannot be shown,

original: thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa /
translated: is without obstruction,

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: and has one mark only,

original: 'di lta ste mtshan nyid med par ro //
analyzed: 'di lta ste mtshan nyid med par ro //
translated: namely, the absence of all marks.

original: rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston to //
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston to //
translated: Subhūti, by this method also you should know that the Great Vehicle is consistent with the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽theg pa chen po yang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / theg pa chen po yang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: And why?🔽It is not the case that the Great Vehicle is one thing and the perfection of wisdom another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus the Great Vehicle and the perfection of wisdom are not two nor divided.

original: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med do /
analyzed: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med do /
translated: the perfection of perseverance another, the perfection of patience another, the perfection of morality another, and the perfection of generosity another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su @279b byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su @279b byar med do //
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle and the perfection of generosity are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: The Great Vehicle is not one thing and the applications of mindfulness another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle and the applications of mindfulness are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /🔽de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de / de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: The Mahāyāna and the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and the eightfold path of the noble ones are not two, nor are they divided into two.🔽Thus, the Mahāyāna and the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and the eightfold path of the noble ones are not two, nor are they divided into two.

original: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya bya ba med de /
analyzed: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya bya ba med de /
translated: The Mahāyāna and the meditative stabilities and the formless absorptions are not two, nor are they divided into two.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle and the formless meditative absorptions are not two nor divided.

original: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi bar yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi bar yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: The Great Vehicle is not one thing, and the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and the element of nirvāṇa another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi bar yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi bar yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle and the element of nirvāṇa are not two nor divided.

original: rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations I teach that the Great Vehicle is taught by teaching the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba'o //
translated: This is the definite emergence of attainment.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: “Lord, it is like this: a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the prior limit,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so /
translated: a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the later limit,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te /🔽gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' @280a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te / gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' @280a * //
translated: and a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because form is infinite,

original: kun du mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: kun du mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: Subhūti, a bodhisattva should be known as infinite.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste /
translated: Because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are infinite, a bodhisattva should be known as infinite.

original: gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs so //
translated: “A form called ‘bodhisattva’ does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs te /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs te /
translated: A feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness called ‘bodhisattva’ does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste mi dmigs na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste mi dmigs na /
translated: Bhagavān, if I do not see and do not apprehend a bodhisattva in any way at all,

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi /
translated: then with regard to what bodhisattva should I give instruction in what perfection of wisdom?”

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du byas te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du byas te /
translated: “Bhagavān, this ‘bodhisattva’ is a mere name.

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang bdag shin tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang bdag shin tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
translated: Bhagavān, just as ‘self’ is said, but a self is not at all apprehended,

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
translated: Blessed One, in the same way, a bodhisattva is said to be a bodhisattva, but a bodhisattva is not something that is accomplished.

original: de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la /
analyzed: de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la /
translated: Thus, Blessed One, in phenomena that are essenceless

original: gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs lta yang ga la mchis /
analyzed: gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs lta yang ga la mchis /
translated: how could there be any form that is accomplished?

original: gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa lta yang ga la mchis /
analyzed: gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa lta yang ga la mchis /
translated: How could there be any feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness that is accomplished?

original: bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so //
translated: Blessed One, that which is not accomplished is not form.

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
translated: That which is not accomplished is not feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags la /
translated: Blessed One, it is like that.

original: mngon par ma grub pa zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi ba'am /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi ba'am /
translated: How could that which is not accomplished be instructed and advised in the perfection of wisdom?

original: mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar dmigs su ma mchis na /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar dmigs su ma mchis na /
translated: Apart from what is not established, a bodhisattva great being who would practice for awakening cannot be apprehended.

original: gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum yongs su mi 'jum /
analyzed: gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum yongs su mi 'jum /
translated: If, when this is being taught, the mind of a bodhisattva great being does not shrink, does not tense up,

original: @280b 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing /🔽yid mi 'jigs /
analyzed: @280b 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi 'jigs /
translated: does not regret it,🔽and if his mind does not tremble,

original: mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na /
translated: is not frightened or terrified,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: then that bodhisattva great being is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then venerable Śāriputra said to venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, why

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin /
translated: is a bodhisattva great being not apprehended at the prior limit,

original: phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin /
translated: is not apprehended at the later limit,

original: dbus su dmigs su med pa yin /
analyzed: dbus su dmigs su med pa yin /
translated: It is not focused on the middle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, why is it so?

original: gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin /
analyzed: gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin /
translated: Because form is infinite, a bodhisattva should be known as infinite.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin /
translated: Because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are infinite, a bodhisattva should be known as infinite.🔽Venerable Subhūti, why is it that a bodhisattva is not so and is not apprehended?

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin /
translated: Because form is not so and is not apprehended,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin /
translated: feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not so and are not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, why is it that

original: de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong mi dmigs na /
translated: In this way, if a bodhisattva great being does not see or observe anything at all, in any way, then

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra /
translated: how could a bodhisattva great being be instructed and advised in the perfection of wisdom?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, why do you say,

original: de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas so zhes smra /
analyzed: de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas so zhes smra /
translated: ‘Blessed One, this “bodhisattva great being” is just a name’?🔽Venerable Subhūti, why do you say,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du bdag bdag ces bgyi yang bdag ni shin tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du bdag bdag ces bgyi yang bdag ni shin tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
translated: ‘Although it is said “I,” “I” is utterly unestablished’?

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
translated: Blessed One, in the same way, although it is said that a bodhisattva is a bodhisattva, a bodhisattva is not something that is established.

original: de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la gzugs mngon par grub pa lta yang ga la mchis /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la gzugs mngon par grub pa lta yang ga la mchis /
translated: Thus, in the nature that is the nonexistence of all phenomena, how could form be something that is established?

original: tshor @281a * //
analyzed: tshor @281a * //
translated: How could feeling,

original: ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta yang ga la mchis /
analyzed: ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta yang ga la mchis /
translated: perception, volitional factors, or consciousness be something that is established?

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa ni gzugs ma lags so //
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa ni gzugs ma lags so //
translated: That which is not established is not form.

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra /
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra /
translated: That which is not established is not feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.”🔽“Subhūti, it is so!

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'am zhes smra /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'am zhes smra /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, why do you say, ‘One who is not established should instruct and teach one who is not established in the perfection of wisdom’?

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, why do you say,

original: de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra /
analyzed: de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra /
translated: ‘apart from that which is not established, a bodhisattva great being is not apprehended’?

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, why do you say,

original: de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: ‘if, when it is taught like this,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum /
translated: the mind of a bodhisattva great being does not become cowed,

original: yongs su mi 'jum /
analyzed: yongs su mi 'jum /
translated: does not tense up,

original: 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: does not become regretful,

original: yid mi 'jigs /
analyzed: yid mi 'jigs /
translated: and the mind does not fall apart,

original: mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra /
analyzed: mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra /
translated: does not tremble, is not frightened, and is not terrified, then that bodhisattva great being practices the perfection of wisdom’?

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Subhuti: Hard to see, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord: Because of the emptiness of the object.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhuti: Inconceivable, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord: Because of the emptiness of the subject and object.🔽Subhuti: Incomparable, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord: Because of the emptiness of all dharmas.🔽Subhuti: Unbounded, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can stong pa nyid dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can stong pa nyid dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
translated: The Lord: Because of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.🔽Subhuti: Measureless, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord: Because of the emptiness of what is not broken down.🔽Subhuti: Equal to the unequalled, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord: Because of the emptiness of what is not rejected.🔽Subhuti: Not defiled, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord: Because of the emptiness of what is not defiled.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhuti: Not quite defiled, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord: Because of the emptiness of what is not quite defiled.🔽Subhuti: Not quite defiled, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord: Because of the emptiness of what is not quite defiled.🔽Subhuti: Not quite defiled, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord: Because of the emptiness of what is not quite defiled.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

translated: Venerable Śāriputra, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle because sentient beings do not exist.

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ci'i phyir @281b zhe na /

translated: Because the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination are empty, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination are isolated, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination are essenceless, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, the nonexistence of the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination, emptiness, isolation, and the lack of an intrinsic nature cannot be discerned at the prior limit,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: cannot be discerned at the later limit,

original: dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: and cannot be discerned in the middle.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The nonexistence of the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination, emptiness, isolation, and the lack of an intrinsic nature are not one thing,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and the bodhisattvas are not another.

original: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The prior limit is not one thing,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and the later limit is not another.

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: And the middle is not another.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, the sense fields, the elements, dependent origination, emptiness, isolation, and the lack of an intrinsic nature, the bodhisattva,

original: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the past because the perfection of generosity does not exist.

translated: because the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom do not exist,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

translated: The past limit, the future limit, and the middle—all of these are nondual and indivisible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus su byang chub sems dpa' nye bar mi dmigs so //

translated: The past limit, the future limit, and the middle are not apprehended because of the emptiness of the absolute, the isolation of the absolute, and the naturelessness of the absolute.

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzin med pa gang yin pa nas /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, thus meditative stabilization is not one thing,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: and up to the very limit of reality is not one thing, and emptiness, isolation, no intrinsic nature, the bodhisattva, and the prior limit, the later limit, and the middle are all not two, and they are not divided.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, for these reasons the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, moreover, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because the śrāvaka is not apprehended.

original: nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because the śrāvaka is empty, is isolated, and has no intrinsic nature.

original: nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the śrāvaka is not apprehended.

original: nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the śrāvaka is empty, is isolated, and has no intrinsic nature.

original: nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the present because the śrāvaka is not apprehended.

original: nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness, isolation, and identitylessness of the śrāvakas, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, because pratyekabuddhas do not exist, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the beginning.

original: rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness, isolation, and identitylessness of pratyekabuddhas, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the beginning.

original: rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because pratyekabuddhas do not exist, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the end.

original: rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs @288b so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs @288b so //
translated: Because of the emptiness, isolation, and identitylessness of pratyekabuddhas, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the end.

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because pratyekabuddhas do not exist, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so / // / bam po nyi shu gsum pa /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of the bodhisattva, because of the isolation of the bodhisattva, and because of the non-apprehension of the essential nature of the bodhisattva, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past.

original: byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

original: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of the bodhisattva, because of the isolation of the bodhisattva, and because of the non-apprehension of the essential nature of the bodhisattva, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
