original: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness, isolation, and identitylessness of a buddha, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the beginning.

analyzed: sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

original: sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness, isolation, and identitylessness of a buddha, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the end.

original: sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a buddha, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,🔽Venerable Śāriputra, it is because the śrāvaka, the emptiness, the isolation, and the absence of an intrinsic nature, up to the knowledge of all aspects, are not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the emptiness of the śrāvaka, the isolation of the śrāvaka, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the śrāvaka, the śrāvaka is not apprehended in the middle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nyan thos med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nyan thos med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang /
translated: Because of the emptiness of the pratyekabuddha, the isolation of the pratyekabuddha, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the pratyekabuddha, the pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the emptiness of the buddha, the isolation of the buddha, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the buddha, the buddha is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the emptiness of the śrāvaka, the isolation of the śrāvaka, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the śrāvaka, the śrāvaka is not apprehended in the middle.

translated: Because of the emptiness of the pratyekabuddha, the isolation of the pratyekabuddha, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the pratyekabuddha, the pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the middle.

original: dben pa yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: dben pa yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Because of the emptiness of the buddha, the isolation of the buddha, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the buddha, the buddha is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the emptiness of the śrāvaka, the isolation of the śrāvaka, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the śrāvaka, the śrāvaka is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the emptiness of the pratyekabuddha, the isolation of the pratyekabuddha, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the pratyekabuddha, the pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the middle.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin /🔽nyan thos kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin /🔽nyan thos kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Because of the emptiness of the buddha, the isolation of the buddha, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the buddha, the buddha is

original: rang sangs rgyas kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the pratyekabuddha is not one thing,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the bodhisattva is not one thing,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is not one thing;

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: the past is not one thing, the future is not one thing, and the present is not one thing.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na nyan thos med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa nas /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na nyan thos med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa nas /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, thus the śrāvaka is not one thing and emptiness, isolation, and the absence of an intrinsic nature are not one thing,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects is not one thing and emptiness, isolation, and the absence of an intrinsic nature are not one thing, and the bodhisattva is not one thing, and the past, future, and present are not one thing. All these are not two, nor are they divided.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, through this one of many explanations

original: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past.🔽He is not apprehended in the future or in the present.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus rnams su mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba dgag pa yin no //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus rnams su mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba dgag pa yin no // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
translated: This is the refutation of attainment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, you have asked, ‘Why is it, Venerable Subhūti, that the bodhisattva is to be known as infinite because form is infinite?

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Why is it that the bodhisattva is to be known as infinite because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are infinite?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, form is equal to space.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are equal to space.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di lta ste /🔽dper na nam mkha' ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di lta ste / dper na nam mkha' ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, it is like this:🔽Space is not observed in the past,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: not observed in the future, and not observed in the present.

original: mtha' yas kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mtha' yas kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is infinite, all-pervading, and limitless,

original: nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: it is called “space.”🔽Venerable Śāriputra, similarly, form is not observed in the past,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs /🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: not observed in the future, and not observed in the present because of the emptiness of form.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not observed in the past,

original: phyi ma'i @289b mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: phyi ma'i @289b mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: not observed in the future, and not observed in the present because of the emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so //
translated: Because emptiness does not observe an end or a middle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kun du mtha' yas /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kun du mtha' yas /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, because of this one of many explanations, form is infinite,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o //
translated: because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are infinite, a bodhisattva should be known as infinite.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, the sense spheres, the elements, dependent origination, all the perfections, all the emptinesses, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: the meditative stabilizations, the unlimiteds, the formless absorptions, the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha are the same as space.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, it is because

original: nam mkha' la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: nam mkha' la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: The past limit of space is not discerned,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: its future limit and its middle are not discerned,

original: mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is infinite and unlimited.

original: nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do //
translated: It is said to be space because of its infinity.🔽Venerable Śāriputra, in the same way, the thirty-two major marks of a superior man are not discerned because of the emptiness of the thirty-two major marks of a superior man.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: The past limit of the thirty-two major marks of a superior man is not discerned,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: its future limit and its middle are not discerned,

original: stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so //
translated: because emptiness is not discerned as having a limit or a middle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, because of this one of many explanations, you should know that bodhisattvas are infinite because the thirty-two major marks of a superior man are infinite.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs zhes zer ba ni /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, you asked, ‘Why is it that “bodhisattva” is a non-existent object and is not apprehended?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, it is because form is empty of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: stong pa nyid la gzugs med /🔽stong pa nyid la @290a * //🔽byang chub sems dpa' med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la gzugs med / stong pa nyid la @290a * // byang chub sems dpa' med /
translated: In emptiness there is no form,🔽in emptiness there is no feeling,

original: stong pa nyid la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med /
translated: in emptiness there is no perception,🔽in emptiness there is no volitional factors,🔽in emptiness there is no consciousness,

original: stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: in emptiness there is no bodhisattva.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, for this reason this ‘bodhisattva’ is non-existent and not apprehended.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are non-existent and not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: In emptiness there is no perfection of giving,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: and there is no bodhisattva.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why, it is because

original: stong pa nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: in emptiness the perfection of wisdom does not exist,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: and a bodhisattva does not exist.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the emptiness of internal phenomena is empty of the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why, it is because

original: stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid med /
translated: in emptiness the emptiness of internal phenomena does not exist,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: and a bodhisattva does not exist.

original: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is empty of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med /
translated: In emptiness, there is no emptiness,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: no bodhisattva,🔽and no perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the applications of mindfulness are empty of the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste /
translated: the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path are empty of the eightfold noble path.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: stong pa nyid la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med /
translated: The applications of mindfulness do not exist in emptiness.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam @290b yan lag brgyad pa med /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam @290b yan lag brgyad pa med /
translated: The right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and the noble eightfold path do not exist.

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: There are no bodhisattvas.

original: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: The meditative stabilizations, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless absorptions, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med /
translated: The noble truths and the distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist in emptiness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: There are no bodhisattvas.

original: chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong /🔽de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong / de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong /
translated: the expanse of reality is empty of the expanse of reality,🔽suchness is empty of suchness,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong /
translated: the very limit of reality is empty of the very limit of reality,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong /
translated: the inconceivable expanse is empty of the inconceivable expanse,

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: the understanding of all things is empty of the understanding of all things,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: the understanding of the aspects of the path is empty of the understanding of the aspects of the path,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: and the understanding of all aspects is empty of the understanding of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med /
translated: Because in emptiness there is no expanse of reality, up to no understanding of all things,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: and no bodhisattvas.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong /
translated: The Śrāvaka Vehicle is empty of the Śrāvaka Vehicle,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong /
translated: the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas is empty of the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong /
translated: the vehicle of the buddhas is empty of the vehicle of the buddhas,

original: nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong /
analyzed: nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong /
translated: śrāvakas are empty of śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong /
translated: pratyekabuddhas are empty of pratyekabuddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste /
translated: and tathāgatas are empty of tathāgatas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa med /
translated: Because emptiness is not the vehicle of the śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bar du med /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bar du med /
translated: up to it is not the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: nyan thos med /
analyzed: nyan thos med /
translated: there are no śrāvakas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du med /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du med /
translated: up to there are no tathāgatas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: and there are no bodhisattvas.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, because of this one of many explanations, ‘bodhisattva’ is a designation for physical forms that do not exist and cannot be found.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams @291a * //🔽cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad du smra zhes zer ba ni🔽/ tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams @291a * // cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad du smra zhes zer ba ni / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, consciousness is not consciousness, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, form is not in feeling, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, feeling is not in form, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, form is not in perception, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, perception is not in form, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, form is not in volitional factors, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, volitional factors are not in form, and are not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, form is not in consciousness, and is not apprehended.

original: gzugs ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so // tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, consciousness is not in form, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, feeling is not in perception, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, perception is not in feeling, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, perception is not in volitional factors, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, volitional factors are not in perception, and are not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, volitional factors are not in consciousness, and are not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, consciousness is not in volitional factors, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, feeling is not in volitional factors, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, volitional factors are not in feeling, and are not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, feeling is not in consciousness, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, consciousness is not in feeling, and is not apprehended.

original: tshor ba ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, perception is not in volitional factors, and is not apprehended.🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, volitional factors are not in perception

original: gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form and feeling are not found in perception and are not apprehended there.

original: 'du shes ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Perception is not found in perception and is not apprehended there.

original: 'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Perception is not found in form and feeling and is not apprehended there.

original: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, feeling, and perception are not found in volitional factors and are not apprehended there.

original: 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Volitional factors are not found in volitional factors and are not apprehended there.

original: 'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Volitional factors are not found in form, feeling, and perception and are not apprehended there.

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, feeling, perception, and volitional factors are not found in consciousness and are not apprehended there.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness is not found in consciousness and is not apprehended there.

original: rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness is not found in form, feeling, perception, and volitional factors and is not apprehended there.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, the eyes are not in the eyes and are not found there.

original: mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes are not in the ears and are not found there.

original: rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The ears are not in the ears and are not found there.

original: rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The ears are not in the eyes and are not found there.

original: mig dang rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes and ears are not in the nose and are not found there.

original: sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose is not in the nose and is not found there.

original: sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose is not in the eyes and ears and is not found there.

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes, ears, and nose are not in the tongue and are not found there.

original: lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue is not in the tongue and is not found there.

original: lce ni mig dang rna ba dang sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce ni mig dang rna ba dang sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue is not in the eyes, ears, and nose and is not found there.

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes, ears, nose, and tongue are not in the body and are not found there.

original: lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The body is not in the body and is not found there.

original: lus ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The body is not in the eyes, ears, nose, and tongue and is not found there.

original: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eye, ear, nose, tongue, and body are not found and are not apprehended in the mind.

original: yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so//
analyzed: yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so//
translated: The mind is not found and is not apprehended in the mind.

original: @291b yid ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: @291b yid ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind is not found and is not apprehended in the eye, ear, nose, tongue, or body.

original: gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form is not found and is not apprehended in form.

original: gzugs ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form is not found and is not apprehended in sound.

original: sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Sound is not found and is not apprehended in sound.

original: sgra ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sgra ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Sound is not found and is not apprehended in form.

original: gzugs dang sgra ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form and sound are not found and are not apprehended in smell.

original: dri ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dri ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Smell is not found and is not apprehended in smell.

original: dri ni gzugs dang sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dri ni gzugs dang sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Smell is not found and is not apprehended in form and sound.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, sound, and smell are not found and are not apprehended in taste.

original: ro ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ro ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Taste is not found and is not apprehended in taste.

original: ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Taste is not found and is not apprehended in form, sound, and smell.

original: gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, sound, smell, and taste do not exist and are not apprehended in contact.

original: reg ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Contact does not exist and is not apprehended in contact.

original: reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Contact does not exist and is not apprehended in form, sound, smell, and taste.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, sound, smell, taste, and contact do not exist and are not apprehended in mental objects.

original: chos ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Mental objects do not exist and are not apprehended in mental objects.

original: chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Mental objects do not exist and are not apprehended in form, sound, smell, taste, and contact.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Eye consciousness does not exist and is not apprehended in eye consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Eye consciousness does not exist and is not apprehended in ear consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ear consciousness does not exist and is not apprehended in ear consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ear consciousness does not exist and is not apprehended in eye consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: The eye consciousness and the ear consciousness

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: are not found in the nose consciousness and are not apprehended there.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose consciousness is not found in the nose consciousness and is not apprehended there.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose consciousness is not found in the eye consciousness and the ear consciousness and is not apprehended there.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eye consciousness, the ear consciousness, and the nose consciousness are not found in the tongue consciousness and are not apprehended there.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue consciousness is not found in the tongue consciousness and is not apprehended there.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue consciousness is not found in the eye consciousness, the ear consciousness, and the nose consciousness and is not apprehended there.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa @292a * //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa @292a * //
translated: the tongue consciousness,

original: dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and the body consciousness are not found and not apprehended in the body consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The body consciousness is not found and not apprehended in the body consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The body consciousness is not found and not apprehended in the eye consciousness, the ear consciousness, the nose consciousness, and the tongue consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eye consciousness, the ear consciousness, the nose consciousness, the tongue consciousness, and the body consciousness are not found and not apprehended in the mind consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind consciousness does not exist and is not found in the mind consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind consciousness does not exist and is not found in the eye consciousness, the ear consciousness, the nose consciousness, the tongue consciousness, or the body consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Eye contact does not exist and is not found in eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Eye contact does not exist and is not found in ear contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ear contact does not exist and is not found in ear contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ear contact does not exist and is not found in eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Eye contact and ear contact do not exist and are not found in nose contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose sense-sphere does not exist in the nose sense-sphere and is not found there.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose sense-sphere does not exist in the eye sense-sphere and the ear sense-sphere, and is not found there.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus re reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus re reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eye sense-sphere, the ear sense-sphere, and the nose sense-sphere do not exist in the tongue sense-sphere and are not found there.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue sense-sphere does not exist in the tongue sense-sphere and is not found there.🔽The tongue sense-sphere does not exist in the eye sense-sphere, the ear sense-sphere, and the nose sense-sphere, and is not found there.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eye sense-sphere, the ear sense-sphere, the nose sense-sphere, and the tongue sense-sphere do not exist in the body sense-sphere and are not found there.

original: lus @292b kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus @292b kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Body contact does not exist and is not found in body contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Body contact does not exist and is not found in eye contact, ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, or body contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Eye contact, ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, and body contact do not exist and are not found in mind contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Mind contact does not exist and is not found in mind contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Mind contact does not exist and is not found in eye contact, ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, or body contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact does not exist and is not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact does not exist and is not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: does not exist and is not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact does not exist and is not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact and the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact do not exist and are not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of nose and object is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from the union of nose and object.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of nose and object is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from the union of eye and object, or in the feeling that arises from the union of ear and object.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor @293a * //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so // lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor @293a * //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of eye and object, the feeling that arises from the union of ear and object, and the feeling that arises from the union of nose and object are not found and are not apprehended in the feeling that arises from the union of tongue and object.

original: ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of tongue and object is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from the union of tongue and object.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the tongue contact is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from eye contact,🔽the feeling that arises from ear contact, or the feeling that arises from nose contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from eye contact, the feeling that arises from ear contact, the feeling that arises from nose contact, and the feeling that arises from tongue contact are not found and are not apprehended in the feeling that arises from body contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from body contact is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from body contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: Feelings arising from the contact of the body are feelings arising from the contact of the eye, the contact of the ear, the contact of the nose, the contact of the tongue, the contact of the body, and the contact of the mind.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the coming together of body and contact is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from the coming together of eye and contact,🔽in the feeling that arises from the coming together of ear and contact, in the feeling that arises from the coming together of nose and contact,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: in the feeling that arises from the coming together of tongue and contact,🔽and in the feeling that arises from the coming together of body and contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the coming together of body and contact is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from the coming together of mind and contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of mental contact does not exist and is not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of mental contact.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of mental contact does not exist and is not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the eye, the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the ear, the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so // nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the tongue, or the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the body.🔽Inner emptiness does not exist and is not found in inner emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi par la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi par la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Inner emptiness does not exist and is not found in outer emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not in the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature and is not found there.

original: @293b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: @293b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not in inner emptiness and is not found there.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A meditative absorption is not in a meditative absorption and is not found there.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs kyi sgo la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs kyi sgo la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A meditative absorption is not in the dhāraṇī gateways and is not found there.

original: gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgo la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgo la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not in the dhāraṇī gateways and are not found there.

original: gzungs kyi sgo ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not in a meditative absorption and are not found there.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not in the applications of mindfulness and are not found there.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yang dag par spong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yang dag par spong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not in the correct exertions and are not found there.

original: lam gyi bar ni lam la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lam gyi bar ni lam la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Up to the path is not in the path and is not found there.

original: lam ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lam ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The path is not found and is not apprehended in the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, or the branches of awakening.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
translated: The four concentrations, the four immeasurable aspirations, the four formless absorptions, and the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi bar rnams la med cing mi dmigs pa de de dang gzhan rnams la yang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi bar rnams la med cing mi dmigs pa de de dang gzhan rnams la yang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: are not found and are not apprehended in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and they are not found and are not apprehended in anything other than the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are not found and are not apprehended in the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas do not exist and are not found in the four fearlessnesses.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist and are not found in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist and are not found in the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, and the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: bsam gtan ni bsam gtan la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan ni bsam gtan la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Concentration does not exist and is not found in concentration.

original: bsam gtan ni tshad med pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan ni tshad med pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Concentration does not exist and is not found in the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The formless absorptions do not exist and are not found in the formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The formless absorptions do not exist and are not found in the concentrations and the immeasurables.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa ni so so'i skye @294a * //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa ni so so'i skye @294a * //
translated: The level of ordinary beings is the level of ordinary beings.🔽

original: bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level of the ordinary person does not exist and is not found on the level of the ordinary person.🔽The level of the ordinary person does not exist and is not found on the spiritual level of the noble ones.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa ni rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa ni rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The spiritual level of the noble ones does not exist and is not found on the level of the ordinary person.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /
translated: The spiritual level of the noble ones does not exist and is not found on the spiritual level of the noble ones.🔽The spiritual level of the śrāvaka does not exist and is not found on the spiritual level of the pratyekabuddha.🔽The spiritual level of the pratyekabuddha does not exist and is not found on the spiritual level of the śrāvaka.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The spiritual level of the pratyekabuddha does not exist and is not found on the bodhisattva’s level.🔽The bodhisattva’s level does not exist and is not found on the spiritual level of the śrāvaka, the spiritual level of the pratyekabuddha, or the tathāgata’s level.🔽The tathāgata’s level does not exist and is not found on the spiritual level of the śrāvaka, the spiritual level of the pratyekabuddha, or the bodhisattva’s level.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tathāgata’s level does not exist and is not found on the tathāgata’s level.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is not found and is not apprehended in the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is not found and is not apprehended in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is not found and is not apprehended in the knowledge of the aspects of the path and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: a stream enterer is not found and is not apprehended in a stream enterer.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: a stream enterer is not found and is not apprehended in a once-returner.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: a tathāgata is not found and is not apprehended in a tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not found or apprehended in the stream-enterers, once-returners, non-returners, arhats, pratyekabuddhas, or bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not found or apprehended in the bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not found or apprehended in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not found or apprehended in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not found or apprehended in the bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva and the perfection of wisdom are not found or apprehended in the instructions and the follow-up teachings.

original: gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Instruction and counsel do not exist and are not found in instruction and counsel.

original: gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni byang chub @294b sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni byang chub @294b sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Instruction and counsel do not exist and are not found in the perfection of wisdom and the Bodhisattva.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na chos thams cad med cing dmigs su med pas byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba las thob ba po dgag pa yin no //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na 'di lta ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na chos thams cad med cing dmigs su med pas byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba las thob ba po dgag pa yin no // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na 'di lta ste /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, since all phenomena are thus non-existent and not found, the Bodhisattva is also non-existent and not found. This is the refutation of the agent in relation to attainment, from the perspective of the renunciation of attainment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ces smra zhes zer ba ni /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di lta ste /
