analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the pair of dharmas called “non-production” and “meditative stabilities and formless absorptions” is not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the perfection of generosity apart from non-production.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the pair of dharmas called “non-production” and “perfection of generosity” is not two and cannot be made two.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, they do not see the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, the uncreated and the perfection of wisdom, are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the uncreated, they do not see the powers of the Tathāgata, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, i.e., the unapprehendable and the unshared qualities of a Buddha, are not two and cannot be divided.

original: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Apart from the unapprehendable, the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended.

original: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, these two dharmas, i.e., the unapprehendable and the knowledge of all aspects, are not two and cannot be divided.

original: @301a * // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mi dmigs so //
analyzed: @301a * // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, because of this one of many explanations, apart from the unapprehendable, one should not apprehend a bodhisattva who would practice for awakening in that way.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha🔽rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra zhes zer ba ni /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, you asked why it is said that when bodhisattva great beings are not afraid, terrified, or scared when this is being taught, then bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad byed pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong la /🔽chos thams cad rmi lam dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad byed pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong la / chos thams cad rmi lam dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, it is because bodhisattva great beings see all phenomena as inactive.🔽They see all phenomena as like a dream.

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra bar /
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra bar /
translated: They see all phenomena as like an illusion,

original: smig rgyu dang 'dra ba /🔽sgra brnyan dang 'dra ba /
analyzed: smig rgyu dang 'dra ba / sgra brnyan dang 'dra ba /
translated: like a mirage,🔽like an echo,

original: mig yor dang 'dra ba /
analyzed: mig yor dang 'dra ba /
translated: like an apparition,🔽and like a reflection in the mirror.

original: sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na /
analyzed: sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, if you ask what is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of wisdom, it is this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: bstan pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not tremble, feel frightened, or become terrified when they hear this teaching.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshos de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshos de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe /
translated: “Lord, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom and investigate those dharmas,

original: 'di ni gzugs zhes bgyi bar gzugs la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
analyzed: 'di ni gzugs zhes bgyi bar gzugs la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
translated: then they do not apprehend form as ‘this is form’ and do not take it up;

original: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
analyzed: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
translated: they do not stand in it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: do not settle down on it, and do not designate it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len te /🔽lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs shing mi len te / lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend perception, do not take it up, do not make a basis of it, do not settle down on it, do not conceive it, and do not designate it as ‘perception.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend volitional factors, do not take them up, do not make a basis of them, do not settle down on them, do not conceive them, and do not designate them as ‘volitional factors.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni mig ces bgyi bar mig la mi dmigs shing mi len te /🔽lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni mig ces bgyi bar mig la mi dmigs shing mi len te / lhag par gnas par mi bgyid / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend eye, do not take it up, do not make a basis of it, do not settle down on it, do not conceive it, and do not designate it as ‘eye.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ces bgyi bar yid la mi dmigs shing mi len te /🔽lhag @301b par gnas par mi bgyid /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ces bgyi bar yid la mi dmigs shing mi len te / lhag @301b par gnas par mi bgyid /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind, do not take them up, do not make a basis of them, do not settle down on them, do not conceive them, and do not designate them as ‘mind.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend form, do not take it up, do not make a basis of it, do not settle down on it, do not conceive it, and do not designate it as ‘form.’🔽At that time, they do not apprehend sound, smell, taste, tangibles, and dharmas, do not take them up, do not make a basis of them, do not settle down on them, do not conceive them, and do not designate them as ‘dharmas.’

original: bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag las 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag las 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe /
translated: Blessed One, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom investigate those phenomena in this way,

original: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
analyzed: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
translated: at that time they do not apprehend or grasp at the perfection of generosity, thinking, ‘This is the perfection of generosity.’

original: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
analyzed: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
translated: They do not settle down on it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: do not become fixated on it, and do not label it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
translated: At that time they do not apprehend or grasp at the perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom, thinking, ‘This is the perfection of wisdom.’

original: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
analyzed: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
translated: They do not settle down on it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it, do not take a stance on it, and do not become fixated on it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend or grasp at inner emptiness, thinking, ‘This is inner emptiness.’🔽They do not settle down on it,🔽do not take a stance on it, and do not become fixated on it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend or grasp at the emptiness of external phenomena, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of external phenomena.’

original: de'i tshe 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar nang stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi bar nang stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
translated: They do not settle down on it,🔽do not take a stance on it, and do not become fixated on it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend or grasp at the emptiness of both inner and outer phenomena, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of both inner and outer phenomena.’🔽They do not settle down on it,

original: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
analyzed: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
translated: do not take a stance on it, and do not become fixated on it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend or grasp at the emptiness of emptiness, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of emptiness.’🔽They do not settle down on it,🔽do not take a stance on it, and do not become fixated on it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend or grasp at the emptiness of great extent, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of great extent.’🔽They do not settle down on it,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: do not take a stance on it, and do not become fixated on it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend or grasp at the emptiness of ultimate reality, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of ultimate reality.’🔽They do not settle down on it,🔽do not take a stance on it, and do not become fixated on it.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bgyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bgyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
translated: At that time, they do not apprehend or grasp at the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.’🔽They do not settle down on it,

original: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
analyzed: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
translated: do not take a stance on it, and do not become fixated on it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend or grasp at the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.’🔽They do not settle down on it,🔽do not take a stance on it, and do not become fixated on it.🔽At that time, they do not apprehend or grasp at the emptiness of the unlimited, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of the unlimited.’

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not settle down on it,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bgyi bar dran pa nye bar gzhag
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bgyi bar dran pa nye bar gzhag
translated: Blessed One, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom investigate those phenomena in this way, at that time they are called ‘those who are mindful of the establishments of mindfulness.’🔽🔽

original: pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
analyzed: pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
translated: “Blessed One, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom investigate those phenomena in this way, they do not apprehend or grasp at the applications of mindfulness, thinking, ‘These are the applications of mindfulness.’

original: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
analyzed: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
translated: They do not settle down on them,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: do not become fixated on them, and do not label them.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi bar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi bar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
translated: They do not apprehend or grasp at the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, branches of awakening, or eightfold noble path, thinking, ‘These are the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, branches of awakening, or eightfold noble path.’

original: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs @302a * //
analyzed: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid / mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs @302a * //
translated: They do not settle down on them,

original: par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: par mi bgyid do //
translated: do not become fixated on them, and do not label them.

original: de'i tshe 'di ni bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi bar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi bar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
translated: At that time, the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations, and the formless absorptions are not apprehended or appropriated in the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations, and the formless absorptions.

original: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //🔽de'i tshe 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bgyi bar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs shing mi len te /🔽lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /

translated: They do not settle down on them.
