original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos 'di dag la yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo zhes bgyi bar ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos 'di dag la yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo zhes bgyi bar ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: “Moreover, Blessed One, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom investigate these phenomena, they think, ‘These are the gateways of meditative absorption and dhāraṇī.’

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la mi dmigs shing mi len te /
translated: “Moreover, Blessed One, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom investigate these phenomena, they do not apprehend or grasp at any of the gateways of meditative stabilization and dhāraṇī.

original: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
analyzed: lhag par gnas par mi bgyid /
translated: They do not settle on them,

original: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do //
translated: do not become fixated on them, and do not label them.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: It is because when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: and they do not see feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so so ba dang bsdus pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so so ba dang bsdus pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the individual or composite aspects of the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see all the aspects of awakening.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the concentrations, immeasurables, formless absorptions, ten powers of the tathāgatas, four fearlessnesses, four detailed and thorough knowledges, or eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan @302b 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: bcom ldan @302b 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: “Blessed One, why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags /
translated: It is because the non-arising of form is not form.

original: bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the non-arising of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: de ltar na rnam par shes pa dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par shes pa dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, consciousness and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das mig gi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de mig ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mig gi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de mig ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the non-arising of the eyes is not the eyes.

original: de ltar na mig dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na mig dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, the eyes and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de yid ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de yid ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the non-arising of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind is not the mind.

original: de ltar na yid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na yid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, the mind and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the non-arising of form is not form.

original: bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de chos ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de chos ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the non-arising of sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects is not mental objects.

original: de ltar na chos dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na chos dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, mental objects and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the non-arising of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.

original: bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the non-arising of the perfection of ethical conduct, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, the perfection of wisdom and nonproduction are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de nang stong pa nyid ma lags so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de nang stong pa nyid ma lags so //
translated: Blessed One, the nonproduction of the emptiness of internal phenomena is not the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the nonproduction of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings is not the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //🔽bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes @303a * //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so // bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes @303a * //
translated: Thus, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings and nonproduction are not two, nor are they divided.

original: pa gang lags pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags /
analyzed: pa gang lags pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the nonproduction of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the non-arising of the correct exertions, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the eightfold noble path is not the eightfold noble path.

original: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, the eightfold noble path and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
translated: Blessed One, the non-arising of the concentrations, immeasurables, formless absorptions, and higher perceptions, and of the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, and the aspects of correct understanding is not the aspects of correct understanding.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te /
translated: “Blessed One, the non-arising of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas is not the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de de bzhin nyid ma lags te /🔽de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de de bzhin nyid ma lags te / de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
translated: “Blessed One, the non-arising of suchness is not suchness.

original: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, suchness and non-arising are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: “Blessed One, the non-arising of the dharma-constituent is not the dharma-constituent.

original: de bzhin nyid dang nam mkha'i khams dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang nam mkha'i khams dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te /
translated: The nonarising of suchness, the element of space, the very limit of reality, the inconceivable expanse, awakening, and the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, the knowledge of all aspects and nonarising are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, it is because nonarising is not one,

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: not two,

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: not many,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /🔽de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te / de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de /
translated: and not separate.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te /
translated: Therefore, the nonarising of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de @303b gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de @303b gzugs ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the decrease of form is not form.

original: bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the decrease of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: de ltar na rnam par shes pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par shes pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, consciousness and its decrease are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar /
translated: Blessed One, it is because

original: 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: decrease is not one,

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: nor is it two,

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: nor is it many,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: nor is it separate.

original: de'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so /🔽// / bam po nyi shu lnga pa /
analyzed: de'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so / // / bam po nyi shu lnga pa /
translated: Therefore, the decrease of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the decrease of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.

original: bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te /
translated: the perfection of concentration, Subhuti, is not one thing, and the extinction of distraction another;🔽the perfection of wisdom, Subhuti, is not one thing, and the extinction of delusion another.🔽Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom, Lord, is not one thing, and the extinction of delusion another.🔽The Lord: So it is, Subhuti, so it is.🔽The perfection of wisdom, Subhuti, is not one thing, and the extinction of delusion another.

original: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom, Lord, is not one thing, and the extinction of greed another.🔽The Lord: So it is, Subhuti, so it is.🔽The perfection of wisdom, Subhuti, is not one thing, and the extinction of greed another.🔽Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom, Lord, is not one thing, and the extinction of hatred another.

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: The Lord: So it is, Subhuti, so it is.🔽The perfection of wisdom, Subhuti, is not one thing, and the extinction of hatred another.

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom, Lord, is not one thing, and the extinction of stupidity another.🔽The Lord: So it is, Subhuti, so it is.🔽The perfection of wisdom, Subhuti, is not one thing, and the extinction of stupidity another.🔽Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom, Lord, is not one thing, and the extinction of sloth another.

original: mang ba ma lags /🔽tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags / tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: The Lord: So it is, Subhuti, so it is.🔽The perfection of wisdom, Subhuti, is not one thing, and the extinction of sloth another.

original: de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa ste /
analyzed: de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa ste /
translated: Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom, Lord, is not one thing, and the extinction of distraction another.🔽The Lord: So it is, Subhuti, so it is.🔽The perfection of wisdom, Subhuti, is not one thing, and the extinction of distraction another.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so //
translated: Subhuti: The

original: bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te /
translated: “Blessed One, the decrease of inner emptiness is not inner emptiness.

original: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, inner emptiness and its decrease are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, it is because the decrease is not one,

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: nor is it two,

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: nor is it many,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: nor is it separate.

original: de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de nang stong pa nyid ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de nang stong pa nyid ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the decrease of inner emptiness is not inner emptiness.

original: bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te /
translated: “Blessed One, the decrease of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is not the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid @304a * //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid @304a * //
translated: Thus, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities

original: dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: and its decrease are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /🔽gnyis ma lags /🔽mang ba ma lags /🔽tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags / gnyis ma lags / mang ba ma lags / tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so //
translated: Blessed One, it is because the decrease of the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities is not the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities.

original: bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the decrease of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, the applications of mindfulness and their decrease are not a duality; they are not divided into two.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /🔽gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags / gnyis ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, it is because the decrease is not one thing,🔽and the applications of mindfulness another;

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: the decrease is not many things,🔽and the applications of mindfulness another;

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: the decrease is not different,🔽and the applications of mindfulness another.

original: de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, Lord, the diminution of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags te /
translated: Lord, the diminution of the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and path is not the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and path.

original: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, Lord, the right efforts and the diminution are not a duality, and they are not divided into two.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Why is that?

original: gnyis ma lags /🔽mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags / mang ba ma lags /
translated: Lord, it is because the diminution is not one thing and the right efforts another,🔽it is not one thing and the legs of miraculous power another,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: it is not one thing and the faculties another,🔽it is not one thing and the powers another,🔽it is not one thing and the limbs of awakening another,🔽and it is not one thing and the path another.

original: de'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the decline of the noble eightfold path is not the noble eightfold path.

original: bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma @304b lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma @304b lags te /
translated: Blessed One, the decline of the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha and the decline are not two but are indivisible.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, it is because the decline is not one,

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: it is not two,

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: it is not many,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: and it is not distinct.

original: de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the diminution of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te /
translated: Lord, the diminution of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: Thus, the knowledge of all aspects and its diminution are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: Lord, it is because that diminution is not one thing and the knowledge of all aspects another,

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: not two things,

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: not many things,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: not distinct things.

original: de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the diminution of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, what is called form is a designation for a non-dual dharma.

original: gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang yang mi gces bgyi ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni thob par nges par 'byung pa las thob par bya ba dang thob par
analyzed: gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang yang mi gces bgyi ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni thob par nges par 'byung pa las thob par bya ba dang thob par
translated: What is called feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is a designation for a non-dual dharma.🔽What is called up to the knowledge of all aspects is a designation for a non-dual dharma.

original: byed pa'i 'brel pa dgag pa yin no //
analyzed: byed pa'i 'brel pa dgag pa yin no //
translated: This is the refutation of the connection between that which is to be attained and that which causes attainment in regard to the definite emergence of attainment.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the Venerable Śāriputra said to the Venerable Subhūti:

original: tshe rab ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe rab ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom thoroughly investigate these dharmas?”🔽“Venerable Subhūti, who is a bodhisattva?

original: chos 'di dag la ji ltar yongs su rtog / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /
analyzed: chos 'di dag la ji ltar yongs su rtog / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /
translated: What is the perfection of wisdom?

original: yongs su rtog pa ni gang /
analyzed: yongs su rtog pa ni gang /
translated: What is thorough investigation?”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Venerable Subhūti replied to Venerable Śāriputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu @305a * //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu @305a * //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes zer ba ni gang gi phyir sems can nyid byang chub yin pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes zer ba ni gang gi phyir sems can nyid byang chub yin pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: because beings themselves are awakening, they are called ‘bodhisattvas.’

original: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam par shes te /
analyzed: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam par shes te /
translated: Through that awakening, they know the nature of all dharmas.

original: chos de dag la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos de dag la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to those dharmas.

original: chos gang dag gi rnam par shes she na /
analyzed: chos gang dag gi rnam par shes she na /
translated: What dharmas does he cognize?

original: gzugs kyi rnam par shes te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rnam par shes te /
translated: He cognizes form,

original: de la mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on it.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes te /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes te /
translated: He cognizes feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness,

original: de la mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on it.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so so ba dang bsdus pa'i rnam par shes te /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so so ba dang bsdus pa'i rnam par shes te /
translated: He cognizes the various aspects of the sense fields, elements, and dependent origination,

original: de la mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on them.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam par shes te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam par shes te /
translated: He cognizes the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: de la mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on them.

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
translated: He cognizes the meditative stabilizations, the unlimiteds, the formless absorptions, the perfections, the ten powers of the Tathāgata, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam par shes te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam par shes te /
translated: He knows the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha,

original: de la mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on them.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin /🔽rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra: Venerable Subhūti, what are the aspects of all dharmas?🔽Subhūti: Venerable Śāriputra, those aspects, those tokens, those signs by which form, or feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness are apprehended,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis gzugs dang / skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams sam /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis gzugs dang / skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams sam /
translated: or the eyes, or a dharma,

original: nang gi chos sam /
analyzed: nang gi chos sam /
translated: or an internal dharma,

original: phyi'i chos sam /
analyzed: phyi'i chos sam /
translated: or an external dharma,

original: 'dus byas sam /
analyzed: 'dus byas sam /
translated: or a compounded dharma,

original: 'dus ma byas rnams 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas rnams 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: or an uncompounded dharma are apprehended—those are called the aspects of all dharmas.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, you asked, ‘What is the perfection of wisdom?’ Venerable Śāriputra, that which is called the perfection of wisdom is far-reaching,

original: zhing kun dga' ba 'phags pa ste /
analyzed: zhing kun dga' ba 'phags pa ste /
translated: it is noble, and it is delightful.

original: des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang la ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags she na /
analyzed: gang la ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags she na /
translated: Why is it far-reaching, noble, and delightful?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu phung po rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu phung po rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags zhes bya'o //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, it is far-reaching, noble, and delightful because it is far-reaching from the aggregates.

original: skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: It is far-reaching, noble, and delightful because it is far-reaching from the sense spheres and the elements.

original: de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin @305b zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin @305b zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called a perfection.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: It is far-reaching, noble, and delightful because it is far-reaching from dependent origination.

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba dug las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba dug las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: He has gone far from all the defilements, from all the false views, from all the worldly destinies, and he has gone far in his joy.

original: de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That is why he is called the One who has Gone Far.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: He has gone far from the perfection of generosity, and he has gone far in his joy.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: That is why he is called the One who has Gone Far.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: He has gone far from the perfection of morality, from the perfection of patience, from the perfection of vigour, from the perfection of meditation, and from the perfection of wisdom, and he has gone far in his joy.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: That is why he is called the One who has Gone Far.

original: nang stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: He has gone far from inner emptiness, and he has gone far in his joy.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: That is why he is called the One who has Gone Far.

original: phyi stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: It is far removed from the emptiness of external things and is exalted in its delight.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called “gone far. ”

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: It is far removed from the emptiness of both external and internal things and is exalted in its delight.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called “gone far. ”

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: It is far removed from the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of the beginningless and endless, the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence and is exalted in its delight.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called “gone far. ”

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: It is far removed from the applications of mindfulness and is exalted in its delight.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called “gone far. ”

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so//
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so//
translated: He has gone far from the right efforts, the legs of magical power, the faculties, the powers, the limbs of awakening, and the noble eightfold path, and he has gone far from the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, and the ten powers of the Tathāgata.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore he is called ‘gone far.’

original: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: He has gone far from the immeasurables and the formless absorptions, and he has gone far from the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signless meditative stabilization, and the undirected meditative stabilization.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore he is called ‘gone far.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so //
translated: He has gone far from the Tathāgata’s ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: des na ring du song zhing 'phags pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na ring du song zhing 'phags pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this perfection of wisdom, which is far-reaching and noble, is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba @306a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba @306a * //
translated: Therefore, it is called far-reaching.

original: zhes bya'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ni ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ni ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags pa yin te /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, for this reason, this is far-reaching and noble delight,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du yongs su rtog pa de ni gang zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du yongs su rtog pa de ni gang zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, as for what you said, ‘What is this thorough investigation?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, here when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: they do not thoroughly investigate form as permanent or impermanent,

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: they do not thoroughly investigate it as happiness or suffering,

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not form mental constructs in terms of ‘self’ or ‘selfless.’

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not form mental constructs in terms of ‘peaceful’ or ‘not peaceful.’

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not form mental constructs in terms of ‘empty’ or ‘not empty.’

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not form mental constructs in terms of ‘with signs’ or ‘signless.’

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not form mental constructs in terms of ‘having aspirations’ or ‘without aspirations.’

original: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not form mental constructs in terms of ‘solitary’ or ‘not solitary.’

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not form mental constructs in terms of ‘feeling,’ ‘perception,’ ‘volitional factors,’ or ‘consciousness’ as being ‘permanent’ or ‘impermanent.’

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not form mental constructs in terms of ‘feeling,’ ‘perception,’ ‘volitional factors,’ or ‘consciousness’ as being ‘happiness’ or ‘suffering.’

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not form mental constructs in terms of ‘feeling,’ ‘perception,’ ‘volitional factors,’ or ‘consciousness’ as being a ‘self’ or ‘not a self.’

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify as “peaceful” or “not peaceful.”

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify as “empty” or “not empty.”

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify as “with signs” or “signless.”

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify as “having aspirations” or “without aspirations.”

original: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify as “isolated” or “not isolated.”

original: mi rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify as “impermanent” or “permanent.”

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify as “happiness” or “suffering.”

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify as “self” or “selfless.”

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify as “peaceful” or “not peaceful.”

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify as “empty” or “not empty.”

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi @306b rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi @306b rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are with signs or are signless.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are with aspirations or are without aspirations.

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go // dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are empty or are not empty.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go // bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are with signs or are signless.

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are entities or are non-entities.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are pure or impure.

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are calm or are not calm.

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are void or are not void.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are afflicted or are purified.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are arising or are ceasing.

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are entities or are non-entities.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are entities or are non-entities.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are entities or are non-entities.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty] are entities or are non-entities.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that [the ears, nose

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is with wishes or that it is without wishes.

original: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is isolated or that it is not isolated.

original: gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that physical forms are permanent or that they are impermanent.

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that they are happiness or that they are suffering.

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that they are a self or that they are not a self.

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that they are calm or that they are not calm.

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that they are empty or that they are not empty.

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that they have signs or that they are signless.

analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not conceptually identify them as “having aspirations” or “without aspirations.”

translated: He does not conceptually identify them as “isolated” or “not isolated.”

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag @307a * //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag @307a * //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the eye consciousness,🔽thinking that it is permanent or that it is impermanent.

analyzed: ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the eye consciousness,🔽thinking that it is happiness or that it is suffering.

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //

translated: thinking that it is peace or that it is not peace.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the eye consciousness,🔽thinking that it is empty or that it is not empty.

translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the eye consciousness,

translated: thinking that it has a sign or that it is signless.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the eye consciousness,

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: thinking that it is having aspirations or that it is without aspirations.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the eye consciousness,

analyzed: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //

translated: He does not form mental constructs or concepts about the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind as being permanent or impermanent,

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: happy or painful,

analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: self or not self,

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: peaceful or not peaceful,

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: empty or not empty,

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: with signs or signless,

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: with wishes or wishless.

original: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is empty or not empty.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that the sensory element of the eyes is calm or not calm.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is void or not void.

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is afflicted or purified.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is arising or ceasing.

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is entities or non-entities.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is with attachment or without attachment.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is with aversion or without aversion.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is with delusion or without delusion.

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go // stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is with contaminants or without contaminants.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is a view of the body or not a view of the body.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is a view of the feelings or not a view of the feelings.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is a view of the mind or not a view of the mind.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is a view of the dharmas or not a view of the dharmas.

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is the perfection of giving or not the perfection of giving.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is the perfection of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, or wisdom or not the perfection of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, or wisdom.

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is the applications of mindfulness or not the applications of mindfulness.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that it is the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, or limbs of awakening or not the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, or limbs of awakening.

original: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar @307b yongs su mi rtog go //🔽bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar @307b yongs su mi rtog go // bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go // bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the sensory element of the body, the sensory element of tangible objects, and the sensory element of tactile consciousness, thinking that they are with or without purity.

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness, thinking that they are with or without purity.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the sensory element of the eyes, the sensory element of sights, and the sensory element of visual consciousness, thinking that they are with or without defilement.

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the sensory element of the ears, the sensory element of sounds, and the sensory element of auditory consciousness, thinking that they are with or without defilement.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the sensory element of the nose, the sensory element of odors, and the sensory element of olfactory consciousness, thinking that they are with or without defilement.

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the sensory element of the tongue, the sensory element of tastes, and the sensory element of gustatory consciousness, thinking that they are with or without defilement.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the sensory element of the body, the sensory element of tangible objects, and the sensory element of tactile consciousness, thinking that they are with or without defilement.

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness, thinking that they are with or without defilement.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as being life-force,🔽as being a human,🔽as being a human being,🔽as being a person,🔽as being an individual,🔽as being an ascetic,🔽as being a brahmin,🔽as being a renunciant,🔽as being a buddha,🔽as being permanent or impermanent,

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as being happiness or suffering,🔽as being a self or not being a self,🔽as being empty or not being empty,

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go // zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as being with signs or signless,🔽as being having aspirations or lacking aspirations,🔽as being calm or not being calm,🔽as being void or not being void,

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as being afflicted or purified,

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as being arising or ceasing,🔽as being afflicted or purified,

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as being desirable or undesirable,🔽as being to be adopted or to be discarded,

original: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as being contaminated or uncontaminated,🔽as being mundane or supramundane,🔽as being compounded or uncompounded.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang /
translated: and in terms of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of mind, mental phenomena, and mind-consciousness.

analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: He does not form mental constructs in terms of permanence or impermanence,

analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //

analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //

analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: in terms of being calm or not calm,🔽in terms of being empty or not empty,🔽in terms of having a sign or being signless,

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: in terms of being compounded or uncompounded,🔽in terms of being afflicted or purified,🔽in terms of being mundane or supramundane,🔽in terms of being contaminated or uncontaminated,🔽in terms of being with outflows or without outflows,🔽in terms of being conditioned or unconditioned,🔽in terms of being virtuous or nonvirtuous,🔽in terms of being to be adopted or to be rejected,🔽in terms of being defiled or purified,🔽in terms of being a śrāvaka,🔽in terms of being a pratyekabuddha,🔽in terms of being a bodhisattva,

analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //

analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //

translated: They do not form mental images of the notion that the emptiness of emptiness is with or without a basis.🔽They do not form mental images of the notion that the emptiness of great extent is with or without a basis.🔽They do not form mental images of the notion that the emptiness of ultimate reality is with or without a basis.🔽They do not form mental images of the notion that the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is with or without a basis.🔽They do not form mental images of the notion that the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is with or without a basis.🔽They do not form mental images of the notion that the emptiness of the unlimited is with or without a basis.🔽They do not form mental images of the notion that the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is with or without a basis.

analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//
