translated: They do not form mental images of the notion that the emptiness of inherent existence is with or without a basis.🔽They do not form mental images of the notion

original: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is having aspirations’ or ‘it is without aspirations. ’🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is calm’ or ‘it is not calm. ’

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is void’ or ‘it is not void. ’

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is afflicted’ or ‘it is purified. ’🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is produced’ or ‘it is extinguished. ’🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is decreased’ or ‘it is increased. ’

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar @308b yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar @308b yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is appropriated’ or ‘it is unappropriated. ’🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is past’ or ‘it is future’ or ‘it is present. ’

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go // stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is wholesome’ or ‘it is unwholesome’ or ‘it is indeterminate. ’🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is the past world’ or ‘it is the future world’ or ‘it is the present world. ’🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is the internal’ or ‘it is the external. ’🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is the seen’ or ‘it is the unseen’ or ‘it is the apparently seen. ’🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is the heard’ or ‘it is the unheard’ or ‘it is the apparently heard. ’

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //🔽dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions that ‘it is the discerned’ or ‘it is the undiscerned’ or ‘it is the apparently discerned. ’🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts on account of the notions

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as a self or not a self,

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as peaceful or not peaceful,

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as empty or not empty,

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: as with signs or signless,

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//
translated: as having aspirations or lacking aspirations,

original: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: or as isolated or not isolated.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental images and concepts of the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, or the noble eightfold path as permanent or impermanent,

original: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: happy or not happy,

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: self or not self,

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: peaceful or not peaceful,

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: empty or not empty,

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: with signs or signless,

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: with wishes or wishless.

original: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that the transcendent perfection of generosity is empty or that it is not empty.

original: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar @309a * //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar @309a * //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, the transcendent perfection of tolerance, the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, the transcendent perfection of wisdom, the applications of mindfulness, the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path are empty or that they are not empty.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of essential nature are empty or that they are not empty.

original: yongs su mi rtog go //🔽bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: yongs su mi rtog go // bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that the emptiness of essential nature is with signs or that it is signless.

original: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that the emptiness of essential nature is with aspirations or that it is without aspirations.

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that the emptiness of essential nature is calm or that it is not calm.

original: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
analyzed: stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go //
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that the emptiness of essential nature is void or that it is not void.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts based on the notions that the emptiness of essential nature is afflicted or that it is purified.
